3195.verse: فَلَمَّا|So when|77|83|141$جَآءَ|came|57|69|4023$سُلَيْمَـٰنَ|(to) Sulaiman|109|121|949$قَالَ|he said,|72|84|309$أَتُمِدُّونَنِ|"Will you provide me|153|165|13195$بِمَالٍ|with wealth?|104|116|13196$فَمَآ|But what|80|86|132$ءَاتَـٰنِۦَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has given me|143|149|13197$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|100|520$مِّمَّآ|than what|88|100|216$ءَاتَـٰكُم|He has given you.|139|151|5022$بَلْ|Nay,|50|62|848$أَنتُم|you|54|66|796$بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ|in your gift|92|98|13198$تَفْرَحُونَ|rejoice.|100|100|13199$

3196.verse: ٱرْجِعْ|Return|74|86|9066$إِلَيْهِمْ|to them,|77|101|3030$فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم|surely, we will come to them|210|234|13200$بِجُنُودٍ|with hosts|89|113|7596$لَّا|not|42|66|30$قِبَلَ|(is) resistance|115|127|1517$لَهُم|for them|76|82|98$بِهَا|of it,|52|65|1203$وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم|and surely, we will drive them out|244|257|13201$مِّنْهَآ|from there|89|102|246$أَذِلَّةً|(in) humiliation,|122|135|13190$وَهُمْ|and they|79|85|256$صَـٰغِرُونَ|(will be) abased."|135|135|7524$

3200.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|80|309$نَكِّرُواْ|"Disguise|78|93|13216$لَهَا|for her|64|79|1226$عَرْشَهَا|her throne;|95|110|13217$نَنظُرْ|we will see|92|107|13218$أَتَهْتَدِىٓ|whether she will be guided|196|211|13219$أَمْ|or|38|45|62$تَكُونُ|will be|72|128|5368$مِنَ|of|50|163|156$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|202|20$لَا يَهْتَدُونَ|are not guided."|126|182|13220$

3201.verse: فَلَمَّا|So when|77|86|141$جَآءَتْ|she came,|88|106|5938$قِيلَ|it was said,|96|114|97$أَهَـٰكَذَا|"Is like this|92|110|13221$عَرْشُكِ‌ۖ|your throne?"|109|126|13222$قَالَتْ|She said,|81|98|2789$كَأَنَّهُۥ|"It is like|77|86|6983$هُوَ‌ۚ|it."|48|69|298$وَأُوتِينَا|"And we were given|151|192|13128$ٱلْعِلْمَ|the knowledge|116|157|9942$مِن قَبْلِهَا|before her|103|144|9455$وَكُنَّا|and we have been|142|163|6992$مُسْلِمِينَ|Muslims."|95|95|6716$

3202.verse: وَصَدَّهَا|And has averted her|155|162|13223$مَا|what|53|67|262$كَانَت|she used (to)|110|124|888$تَّعْبُدُ|worship|70|84|11199$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|115|224$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|Allah.|56|70|2$إِنَّهَا|Indeed, she|98|105|666$كَانَتْ|was|71|130|888$مِن|from|50|169|53$قَوْمٍ|a people|76|195|3192$كَـٰفِرِينَ|who disbelieve.|121|180|3121$

3195.verse: So when they came to Solomon, he said, "Do you provide me with wealth? But what Allah has given me is better than what He has given you. Rather, it is you who rejoice in your gift.

3196.verse: Return to them, for we will surely come to them with soldiers that they will be powerless to encounter, and we will surely expel them therefrom in humiliation, and they will be debased."

3197.verse: [Solomon] said, "O assembly [of jinn], which of you will bring me her throne before they come to me in submission?"

3198.verse: A powerful one from among the jinn said, "I will bring it to you before you rise from your place, and indeed, I am for this [task] strong and trustworthy."

3199.verse: Said one who had knowledge from the Scripture, "I will bring it to you before your glance returns to you." And when [Solomon] saw it placed before him, he said, "This is from the favor of my Lord to test me whether I will be grateful or ungrateful. And whoever is grateful - his gratitude is only for [the benefit of] himself. And whoever is ungrateful - then indeed, my Lord is Free of need and Generous."

3200.verse: He said, "Disguise for her her throne; we will see whether she will be guided [to truth] or will be of those who is not guided."

3201.verse: So when she arrived, it was said [to her], "Is your throne like this?" She said, "[It is] as though it was it." [Solomon said], "And we were given knowledge before her, and we have been Muslims [in submission to Allah].

3202.verse: And that which she was worshipping other than Allah had averted her [from submission to Him]. Indeed, she was from a disbelieving people."

3203.verse: She was told, "Enter the palace." But when she saw it, she thought it was a body of water and uncovered her shins [to wade through]. He said, "Indeed, it is a palace [whose floor is] made smooth with glass." She said, "My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, and I submit with Solomon to Allah, Lord of the worlds."
